title: $17 & up -- Toronto Marlies Hockey incl. Opening Weekend
text:
Toronto Marlies 
Get ready to cheer on the Toronto Marlies on opening weekend and all regular scheduled home matchups this October at Ricoh Coliseum.   save as much as 35% on upcoming games. 
Choose from the following seating sections at Ricoh Coliseum: Goal Line ... $17 (reg. $26 incl. fees) Sides â€¦ $24 (reg. $33 incl. fees) Centre .. $26 (reg. $37 incl. fees) Platinum ... $29 (reg. $41 incl. fees) 
For the following available games: Friday, Oct. 9 at 7 p.m. vs. Manitoba Moose Saturday, Oct. 10 at 3 p.m. vs. Manitoba Moose Saturday, Oct. 17 at 3 p.m. vs. Albany Devils Sunday, Oct. 18 at 3 p.m. vs. Albany Devils Wednesday, Oct. 28 at 7 p.m. vs. Syracuse Crunch Friday, Oct. 30 at 7 p.m. vs. Grand Rapids Griffins 
Coming off a second place finish in the 2014-'15 regular season, fans can scream and shout during the first month of Toronto Marlies home games in Toronto. Watch up and coming Toronto Maple Leaf prospects Josh Leivo, Brendan Leipsic and Frederik Gauthier, known as "Freddy the Goat," strut their stuff on the ice. Toronto Marlies Hockey incl. Opening Weekend $ $17
